greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of numbers obtained from the partition array A134150.
comment: In the same manner the unsigned Lah triangle A008297 is obtained from the partition array A130561.
link: W. Lang, First 10 rows and more.
formula: a(n,m)=sum(product(S2(4;j,1)^e(n,m,q,j),j=1..n),q=1..p(n,m)) if n>=m>=1, else 0. Here p(n,m)=A008284(n,m), the number of m parts partitions of n and e(n,m,q,j) is the exponent of j in the q-th m part partition of n. S2(4;j,1)= A007559(j) = A035469(j,1) = (3*j-2)!!!.
xref: Cf. A134152 (row sums). A134272 (alternating row sums).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_ Nov 13 2007
